Reviews.Title: I didn't get the product described
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I got this product, the box's label said 4390SLV but the laptop inside was not as described.It has only a Intel HD Graphics and not an AMD Radeon.

Reviews.Title: What the heck, Amazon? I need my money back ....
Reviews.Author: Deyaaeddin Alnaas
Reviews.Content: What the heck, Amazon? I bought This laptop with a dedicated AMD Radeon HD 8730M with 2G DDR3 VRAM as described in the details, but I got a laptop with Intel HD 4000 integrated video.

Reviews.Title: I didn't get la laptop I bought
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought a laptop with a dedicated video card, but what I got was a laptop with integrated video which I can't use.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: antonio Camponovo
Reviews.Content: Not good, i think it was better but i have a lot of problems whit it. Bad windows and grapics

Reviews.Title: Wrong item
Reviews.Author: Fede
Reviews.Content: The laptop is not as described. It has an Intel HD 4000 video card not an AMD Radeon. I bought a laptop with a dedicated video card but I received a laptop with an integrated video card.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jeison
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop, an incredible price, if you need something like that you must will purchase this computer, I am very happy with the computer

Reviews.Title: not amd only intel
Reviews.Author: Lucian VADUVESCU
Reviews.Content: I bought This laptop with a dedicated AMD Radeon HD 8730M with 2G DDR3 VRAM as described in the details, but I got a laptop with Intel HD 4000 integrated video.
